yapping_tooltips.item.arts_and_crafts.bl: I don't know why Yirmiri wants to bleach sheep so badly
For the 100th time you can't use bleach on sheeps
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.b: A woolly block bleached and it blocks vibrations!
Never use bleach on carpets!
Sleeping with bleach? This can't be healthy
Concrete powder that has been hardened and bleached
A mixture of gravel and sand that got bleached
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.c: No you can't make armor that floats in water with it
So I kinda dislike acacia logs
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.s: The one and only insanity cube!
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.c: Do or do not, there is no try
Almost got called 'Cork Boards'
Is it a Cork Board Slab? Nope just Cork Slab
Don't fall down the Cork Stairs
Produces a redstone signal when ANY entity makes contact with it
Foliage from a cork tree
Can be pushed by players, arrows, and tridents, stays pushed for 1.5 seconds
Too high to jump over
Commonly used for everything BUT traps
Make yourself feel at home and now imagine if your home could float!
A sturdy piece of wood from the cork log
Can be opened, connects with fences and walls
It started off invisible and now you can write on it!
Its like signs but better!
yapping_tooltips.item.arts_and_crafts.co: Don't walk the plank, you can't float like a boat
Who needs friends when you have a loyal chest?
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.g: Generates in the sandstone layer of Deserts and can be used to craft chalk!
Calcium is good for your bones and can help make good stairs
They did Darth Maul dirty
You can't jump over walls
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.p: Gypsum but polished
Keep the stairs clean!
Poor Polished Gypsum got cut in half
You can't jump over walls, I'm sorry
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.g: Who doesn't love building with bricks?
Falling may cause injury
Darth Maul survived being chopped in half?
You can't jump over walls, I'm sorry, you just can't for some reason
yapping_tooltips.block.arts_and_crafts.p: Put Gypsum in a furnace and you can get some plaster!
